title: Spring Flower, Autumn Moon - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Female Protagonist   Time Travel   Transmigration
author: Shu Ke   蜀客
description:
Jinjiang Traverse Corporation is not the usual traverse. 

After going through several rounds of interviews Lei Lei embarked on her traversing journey. 

What exactly is the identity of this lady whom she traversed into? And what kind of shocking experiences would she go through in this body? 

“Lei Lei is healthier”……

comedic yet not idiotic literature, can’t help but be touched by warm feelings till the end. 

Another impressive work under the Tian Lei Jiao category, not to be missed.

T/N: Tian Lei Jiao is a convention derived from online members of a Chinese forum. Traversing means under this category includes but is not limited to, time-warping, such as in this novel.>
